title: Broccoli

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the broccoli emoji is a vibrant and meticulously detailed miniature representation of the popular cruciferous vegetable. Its florets are depicted with a delightful texture, showcasing subtle variations in green hue achieved through smooth gradients, and the stem appears firm with a soft, rounded base.  The realistic lighting and glossy finish make this healthy food emoji on Apple devices look fresh and appealing, often used to signal healthy eating choices or a desire for nutritious meals.
